BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application No. N 180133 HKM pursuant to Section 3020 of the New York City Charter, concerning the designation by the Landmarks Preservation Commission of the Salvation Army National and Territorial Headquarters located at 120-130 West 14th Street (Block 609, p/o Lot 2) as an historic landmark, Borough of Manhattan, Community District 2, Council District 3.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, The Salvation Army Headquarters,120-130 West 14th Street, Manhattan (N 180133 HKM)

Items.Title: Application No. 20175110 HHQ submitted by New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation, pursuant to Section 7385(6) of the HHC Enabling Act, for approval to lease a parcel of land on the campus of Queens Hospital Center to Dunn Development and NYC Partnership Housing Development Fund Company, Inc. for the development of approximately 206 units of affordable housing, Borough of Queens, Community Board 8, Council District 24.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, Queens Hospital Center T Building, Queens (20175110 HHQ)

Items.Title: Application No. 20175110 HHQ submitted by New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation, pursuant to Section 7385(6) of the HHC Enabling Act, for approval to lease a parcel of land on the campus of Queens Hospital Center to Dunn Development and NYC Partnership Housing Development Fund Company, Inc. for the development of approximately 206 units of affordable housing, Borough of Queens, Community Board 8, Council District 24.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, Queens Hospital Center T Building, Queens (20175110 HHQ)
